item.title: Resume
item.description: Contact Christopher Negrich Github:   cnegrich LinkedIn: Christopher Negrich Email:    cnegrich@gmail.com Summary I am a recent college graduate interested in computer security and software development. I have a strong background in computer science, especially in computer security and data analysis. I attended Barrett Honors College at Arizona State University where I studied Mathematics. While in college, I worked in several research positions in computer security, bioinformatics, and neuroscience. Currently, I work as a Sr.
